input.sentences: it was the young girl 's birthday party .
her family were having fun watching her eat it .
she had a good birthday party .
output.sentences: Today was her big sister's birthday.  But she was very excited to eat cake.
She couldn't wait until they finished singing to her sister, she needed cake.  She just stuck her fingers right in!
Finally she was able to get a big piece of cake all to herself.
The cake was so delicious that she used both hands and ended up with blue icing all over her face.
Everyone laughed because it was so funny to see her with icing on her face.
